alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Cherokee; Clay; Dickinson; O'Brien; Plymouth; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 5:02AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOW UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with a mix of sleet and freezing rain at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of less than one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, northeast Nebraska and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Buena Vista; Cherokee; Clay; Dickinson; O'Brien; Plymouth; Sioux
